_header: Here may ye hear now what ye be
Title(s): ‘Sapiencia huius mundi stulticia est apud deum’
_description: John Audelay, ‘Sapiencia huius mundi stulticia est apud deum’ — four 13-line stanzas

BodDou302.First Lines:
Here may ȝe here now hwat ȝe beHere may ȝe cnow hwat
                    ys þis worlde…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…That made þis bok by goddus gracedeeff siek blynd as he
                    lay
BodDou302.Note:
On f. 35: ‘Sapiencia huius mundi stulticia est apud
                    deum’.
BodDou302.Editions:
Whiting,  Ella Keats,
                        ed.  
             John Audelay: The Poems.
EETS
         o.s. 184 (1931); repr. 1988: 223-4.
